name: Renekton
title: the Butcher of the Sands
lore: Renekton is a terrifying, rage-fueled Ascended being from the scorched deserts of Shurima. Once, he was his empire's most esteemed warrior, leading the nation's armies to countless victories. However, after the empire's fall, Renekton was entombed beneath the sands, and slowly, as the world turned and changed, he succumbed to insanity. Now free once more, he is utterly consumed with finding and killing his brother, Nasus, who he blames, in his madness, for the centuries he spent in darkness.
blurb: Renekton is a terrifying, rage-fueled Ascended being from the scorched deserts of Shurima. Once, he was his empire's most esteemed warrior, leading the nation's armies to countless victories. However, after the empire's fall, Renekton was entombed...
allytips: Slice and Dice excels at harassing maneuvers. Slice in, follow up with another skill and then Dice back out to safety.
Cull the Meek drains an enormous amount of life when used in the middle of the fray. You can use this to bait opponents into thinking you are weaker than you really are.
Cooldown reduction is especially good for Renekton, allowing him to both quickly build up and use his Fury.
enemytips: Pay close attention to Renekton's Fury gauge as that will usually signify when he is about to attack.
Keeping Renekton from being able to fight and gain Fury by continually harassing him will severely reduce the effectiveness of his abilities.

riot_spells.name: Cull the Meek
riot_spells.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.

riot_spells.name: Ruthless Predator
riot_spells.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per hit ({{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total).

Each strike applies on-hit effects and generates Fury. Hitting a champion generates an additional {{ e7 }} Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, instantly destroying damage shields on the target before dealing a total of {{ e6 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage and stunning his target for {{ e4 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.

riot_spells.name: Slice and Dice
riot_spells.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through.

He generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of {{ e0 }} Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for {{ e9 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.

riot_spells.name: Dominus
riot_spells.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
riot_spells.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ buffduration }} seconds, gaining {{ healthgain }} Health and {{ furyoncast }} Fury. While active, he deals {{ totaldamagepersecond }} magic damage to nearby enemies and gains {{ furypersecond }} Fury per second.

riot_passive.name: Reign of Anger
riot_passive.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

i1.name: Reign of Anger
i1.blurb: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Renekton''' generates {{tip|fury|{{as|5 Fury}}}} each time he lands a [[basic attack]] on an enemy, and loses {{as|4 Fury}} per second if he hasn't dealt or taken damage in the last 12 seconds.
i1.description2: When at or above {{as|50 Fury}}, '''Renekton's''' next [[Champion ability|basic ability]] consumes {{as|50 Fury}} to enhance its effects. The enhanced ability does not generate {{as|Fury}}.
i1.description3: {{sbc|Reign of Anger:}} '''Renekton''' generates {{as|50% '''bonus''' Fury}} from all sources while {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% of his '''maximum''' health}}}}.
i1.notes: * ''Renekton'' generates Fury by collecting [[Health Relic (Howling Abyss)|Health Relics]] on {{tip|Howling Abyss}} (interacts with ''Reign of Anger's'' bonus generation).

q1.name: Cull the Meek
q1.blurb: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renekton''' deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all nearby enemies and {{sti|healing|heals}} himself for each unit hit, up to a cap.
q1.description2: '''Renekton''' also generates {{tip|fury|{{as|{{fd|2.5}} Fury}}}} for each non-champion hit and {{as|10 Fury}} for each champion hit, with the {{as|Fury}} generated per cast capped at 30.
q1.description3: Against champions the healing is increased by 300%.
q1.leveling3: {{st|Champion Healing|{{ap|12 to 36}} {{as|(+ 16% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Enhanced Champion Healing|{{ap|36 to 108}} {{as|(+ 48% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.description4: {{sbc|{{ai|Reign of Anger|Renekton}}:}} ''Cull the Meek'' deals additional damage, increases the total healing by 200%, and the healing cap by 300%.
q1.notes:
* ''Cull the Meek'' has a {{fd|0.25}} seconds cast time and does not interrupt ''Renekton's'' previous orders.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Cull the Meek's'' healing cap.

w1.name: Ruthless Predator
w1.blurb: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renekton's''' next basic attack within 7 seconds gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and strikes his target twice dealing {{As|modified physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. Each hit applies [[on-hit effect]]s and grants {{tip|fury|{{as|Fury}}}}. Hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} grants {{as|10 '''bonus''' Fury}}.
w1.leveling: {{st|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|5*2 to 45*2}} {{as|(+ 150% AD)}}|Physical Damage Per Hit|{{ap|5 to 45}} {{as|(+ 75% AD)}}}}
w1.description2: {{sbc|{{ai|Reign of Anger|Renekton}}:}} '''Renekton''' destroys damage-mitigating shields on the target before striking them 3 times, dealing 50% '''bonus''' damage and increasing the {{tip|stun}} duration to {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
w1.notes:
* ''Ruthless Predator'' has a {{tt|{{fd|0.5}} seconds|Estimated}} cast time during which ''Renekton'' cannot perform any actions (can use [[summoner spell]]s as well as [[active ability items]]).
** ''Ruthless Predator's'' cast time can be dual cast with active ability items that play one of their own  ({{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Crescent}}).
** ''Ruthless Predator's'' cast time can be canceled with {{ais|Dominus|Renekton}}.
* The basic attack can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the modified damage cannot).

e2.name: Dice
e2.blurb: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
e2.description: {{sbc|Active - Dice:}} '''Renekton''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies he passes through.
e2.description2: Both ''Slice'' and ''Dice'' generate {{tip|fury|{{as|2 Fury}}}} for each non-champion hit, and {{as|10 Fury}} for each champion hit, with the {{as|Fury}} generated per dash capped at 30.
e2.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Reign of Anger|Renekton}}:}} ''Dice'' deals additional damage to all enemies and reduces their {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} for 4 seconds.
e2.leveling3:
{{st|Enhanced Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 250}} {{as|(+ 135% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Enhanced Damage|{{ap|40+70 to 160+250}} {{as|(+ 225% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|25 to 35}}%|armor}}}}
e2.notes:
* Movement speed has minimal to no impact on the dash speed.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Renekton'' can cast ''Dice'' even if ''Slice'' is blocked.

e1.name: Slice
e1.blurb: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active - Slice:}} '''Renekton''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies he passes through.
e1.description2: Hitting an enemy allows '''Renekton''' to cast ''Dice'' within the next 4 seconds.
e1.notes:
* Movement speed has minimal to no impact on the dash speed.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Renekton'' can cast ''Dice'' even if ''Slice'' is blocked.

r1.name: Dominus
r1.blurb: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renekton''' empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}, increased size, {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and {{tip|fury|{{as|20 Fury}}}}.
r1.description2: For the duration, he deals {{tip|magic damage|{{As|magic damage}}}} each half second to all nearby enemies and generates {{as|5 Fury}} per second, up to a maximum of {{as|75 Fury}}.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage Per Half Second|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20*30 to 60*30}} {{as|(+ 300% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Dominus' ''range increase does not stack with {{ai|Ruthless Predator|Renekton}}.
* ''Dominus' ''cooldown starts on-cast (is not refunded if ''Renekton'' is killed during the cast animation).
* ''Dominus' ''bonus health gain does not interact with {{ii|Spirit Visage}} or {{tip|Grievous Wounds}}.
** ''Renekton'' retains ''Dominus' ''bonus health (if not over his normal maximum) once the duration ends.
